client.view

Interface IModelAdapter<TaskItem>

  • Type Parameters:
    TaskItem - type of drop list task item

    public interface IModelAdapter<TaskItem>
    adapter for client's view to communicate to model
    Author:
    Haoshan Zou, Xiaojun Wu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IModelAdapter<?> NULL_OBJECT
      null object for initialization

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TaskItem addTask(java.lang.String taskname)
      Request the model to generate task item from string input
      TaskItem combineTask(TaskItem selectedTask1, TaskItem selectedTask2)
      combine two tasks
      java.lang.String connect(java.lang.String ip)
      Request that model connect to the RMI Registry at the given remote host.
      void quit()
      Quits the application and gracefully shuts down the RMI-related resources.
      java.lang.String runTask(TaskItem selectedTask, java.lang.String param)
      Request the remote server to run the task and return result
      void sendMsg(java.lang.String text)
      send a message to remote server's view

    • Field Detail

      • NULL_OBJECT

        static final IModelAdapter<?> NULL_OBJECT
        null object for initialization

    • Method Detail

      • quit

        void quit()
        Quits the application and gracefully shuts down the RMI-related resources.

      • connect

        java.lang.String connect(java.lang.String ip)
        Request that model connect to the RMI Registry at the given remote host.
        Parameters:
        ip - the remote host ip to connect to
        Returns:
        a status string regarding the connection result

      • sendMsg

        void sendMsg(java.lang.String text)
        send a message to remote server's view
        Parameters:
        text - input text message

      • addTask

        TaskItem addTask(java.lang.String taskname)
        Request the model to generate task item from string input
        Parameters:
        taskname - input full task name
        Returns:
        a TaskItem to be saved in the drop list

      • runTask

        java.lang.String runTask(TaskItem selectedTask,
                         java.lang.String param)
        Request the remote server to run the task and return result
        Parameters:
        selectedTask - user selected task to be executed
        param - input task parameter
        Returns:
        string output of execution result

      • combineTask

        TaskItem combineTask(TaskItem selectedTask1,
                     TaskItem selectedTask2)
        combine two tasks
        Parameters:
        selectedTask1 - user selected task in drop list 1
        selectedTask2 - user selected task in drop list 2
        Returns:
        TaskItem of the combined task
